item.title: How to show time as x-minute ago in your website
item.description: Have you ever wondered how to show time as x-minute ago in your website? Displaying date as DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm:ss is very common, but due the frequency of content posted on your website there could be a need to show time as x-minutes ago. Best method to this by using simple javascript libraries, which saves you a lot of server side coding. Are you wondering how Ok letâ€™s begin, You can achieve this by moment.
